system.effect: A grazing strike against the leg slows the target. The target's Movement is reduced by half (rounding up) for 1 round. He must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round and fall Prone.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Leg (Severity 2)

A grazing strike against the leg slows the target. The target's Movement is reduced by half (rounding up) for 1 round. He must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round and fall Prone.
